text:
Aharon Yadlin (; born 17 April 1926) is a former Israeli educator and politician. He was born in Ben Shemen, Mandatory Palestine.
Yadlin studied at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
He was a member of the The Alignment after switching from the Labor Party.
He served as Deputy Minister of Education from 1964 through 1972, and as Minister of Education from 1974 through 1977 in the First Rabin Government.
